name: Pixel Detective
description:
The world is a dangerous place. Assaults, robberies and murders are commonplace. Take on the role of a criminal detective and make people who make our lives harder receive the appropriate punishment.

  • Carry out autopsies and site investigation to get a bigger picture of the situation
  • Talk to the suspects to find out more about the incident
  • Find evidence and clues that will lead you to solve the case
  • Solve puzzles to find evidence that is not visible at first glance
  • Analyze the found evidence and clues and find the criminal

Everyone has something on their conscience, but you have to designate one person who is responsible for the whole incident. There is no mistake. Make only informed decisions, because it is up to you to decide who will go to jail.

Special thanks to everyone who helped us translate the game.
